name: ech_splits_wide_char
description: ECH at the continuation cell of a wide char should clean up the entire wide char pair
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), B. CUP(1,3) → cursor at (0,2) the continuation cell. ECH 1 erases (0,2). The wide char head at (0,1) is also cleaned up because its continuation was destroyed.
